sentences: The cat slept near the warm window.

Please place the book on that table.

Our team won the final home game.

She quickly closed the door behind us.
The river flowed slowly toward the bridge.
We watched movies all Saturday at home.
The classroom felt cold before the lecture.
He packed snacks for the long drive.
The flowers bloomed after yesterdayâ€™s heavy rain.
My neighbor watered plants in the backyard.
The airplane landed safely on the runway.
They painted their house bright yellow today.

The kids played games in the hallway.
